      • installAutoscrollToSourceHandler

        public AnAction installAutoscrollToSourceHandler(Project project,
                                                 javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                                 AutoScrollToSourceOptionProvider optionProvider)
        Description copied from class: CommonActionsManager
        Installs autoscroll capability support to JTree passed. Toggle action returned.
        Specified by:
        installAutoscrollToSourceHandler in class CommonActionsManager
        Parameters:
        project - current project
        tree - should provide CommonDataKeys.NAVIGATABLE for handler to work on
        optionProvider - get/set API to externalizable property.
        Returns:
        toggle action to be inserted to appropriate toolbar
